data.title: Palladium
data.meta_description: Darin Herron \n Columbus, OH - Darin Herron, 47, of Columbus, OH, formerly of Richmond, IN passed away Saturday,...
data.text:
Darin Herron

Columbus, OH - Darin Herron, 47, of Columbus, OH, formerly of Richmond, IN passed away Saturday, August 6, 2016. Darin was born in Richmond on April 13, 1969, to Ray and Earsley Herron. Darin graduated from Richmond Senior High School in 1987 and was formerly employed with Express Scripts.

Darin leaves his wife, Bridget Yoder Herron, seven children; Megan Kenna Herron Sisson of Indianapolis, Jarod, Darian, Seth, Caleb, Adrian, and Maia Herron, all of Columbus, OH, and step-son; Anthony Yoder of Columbus, OH. He leaves three brothers and a sister; Delmer Herron of Richland, WA; Dennis Herron of Richmond, IN, Jamie Herron of Park Hills, KY; Diane Herron (David Gardner) of Hudson, OH. Several nieces and nephews and great-nieces and nephews as well as many aunts, uncles, and cousins are also left to grieve the loss.

Darin was preceded in death by his parents and his eldest brother, Dannie Herron.

Services for Darin will be held at Tidd Funeral Home, 5265 Norwich Street, Hilliard, Ohio, where friends and family may call from 6 to 8 p.m. on Friday, August 12, 2016. Funeral services will be held at the funeral home at 10 am Saturday. Interment at Forest Grove Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions may be made to the funeral home on behalf of the family.
